verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: awarded] [ARG2: a retired US Navy SEAL Britt K. Slabinski] [ARG1: with the Medal of Honor] [ARGM-CAU: in recognition of his actions during a 2002 clash with enemy combatants while serving in Afghanistan] .

President Donald Trump awarded a retired US Navy SEAL Britt K. Slabinski with the Medal of Honor in recognition of his actions during a 2002 clash with enemy combatants while [V: serving] [ARGM-LOC: in Afghanistan] .
